meanings.definition: A performer of miracles or magic.
meanings.sent1: The thaumaturge amazed the audience with his magical tricks.
meanings.sent2: The children were in awe of the thaumaturge's ability to make objects disappear.
meanings.sent3: The thaumaturge's rabbit trick always brought laughter to the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her skills as a thaumaturge were so extraordinary, it seemed like she could bend reality.
meanings.sent5: The thaumaturge's performance was so enchanting that it stayed in everyone's memory for years.

meanings.definition: One who practices or performs magic or miracles.
meanings.sent1: The village believed the old man was a powerful thaumaturge capable of healing the sick.
meanings.sent2: The young apprentice aspired to become a skilled thaumaturge like his mentor.
meanings.sent3: The thaumaturge's potions were so potent that even the animals in the forest sought his help.
meanings.sent4: She was a thaumaturge in the kitchen, turning simple ingredients into delicious meals.
meanings.sent5: The legendary thaumaturge was said to have brought rain to the drought-stricken land with a wave of his hand.
